dialogueNodes.nodeText: I can't say I've seen you around here before, stranger. What brings you to the once-great city of Crestmourn?

nodeResponses.nodeResponseText: I'm looking for work. Know of anything?
I've heard things are bad here. I've come to help.

dialogueNodes.nodeText: You've come at a particularly bad time, I'm afraid. The whole city's been taken over by those wretched Followers of Bolothamogg.
That's a nice sentiment, but take it from me -- you don't want to mess with the Followers of Bolothamogg.

We shouldn't really be talking about this... They don't like it when you say the name. Listen, if it's a gig you want, maybe we can work something out. You see that gentleman in the corner? That's Quinton, he usually sorts out the entertainment here. Worth a shot speaking to him, I should think.
